name: InfraSoul
description:
RUN IN CHROME PLEASE: To play, extract all files and open "index.html"

Student Project, recommended to run in Chrome as it can break in Firefox. All photos and illustrations taken or drawn by myself. Music is by WHAT LEO TOLD ME.
If the story does not make sense that's fine, it's based off a screenplay that never saw the light of day. I'd recommend reading the story section to get more context.

Let me know of any bugs!
